data.text:
@WallStreetRy I left the office in 2003 and never returned.

35% of the work force is ever going back.
@WallStreetRy Lol same dude. Finally went into the office last Friday and it felt weird not wearing sweatpants
@WallStreetRy Damn. I've gotta get on your level Ryan. Sleek setup you've got there.
